title: 服务器插件无法绑定事件问题
author: SunnyDream
txt_content:
[18:35:59 ERROR]: Could not pass event ProjectileLaunchEvent to NewCustomCuiLian v3.7.3.2
org.bukkit.event.EventException: null
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader$1.execute(JavaPluginLoader.java:306) ~[spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-2cf50f0-2b93d83]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.RegisteredListener.callEvent(RegisteredListener.java:62) ~[spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-2cf50f0-2b93d83]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.fireEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:500) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-2cf50f0-2b93d83]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.callEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:485) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-2cf50f0-2b93d83]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.event.CraftEventFactory.callProjectileLaunchEvent(CraftEventFactory.java:791) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-2cf50f0-2b93d83]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.World.addEntity(World.java:1038) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-2cf50f0-2b93d83]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.WorldServer.addEntity(WorldServer.java:1115) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-2cf50f0-2b93d83]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.CraftWorld.addEntity(CraftWorld.java:1221) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-2cf50f0-2b93d83]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.CraftWorld.spawn(CraftWorld.java:1228) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-2cf50f0-2b93d83]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.CraftWorld.spawn(CraftWorld.java:863) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-2cf50f0-2b93d83]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.CraftWorld.spawnEntity(CraftWorld.java:363) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-2cf50f0-2b93d83]
        at com.shampaggon.crackshot.CSDirector$4.run(CSDirector.java:2189) [CrackShot.jar:?]

NewCustomCuiLian 版本什么的都是正确的 以及Crackshot也是正确的版本 但是一旦召唤一把枪械进行扫射这淬炼就在后台疯狂报错
我想知道如何在保证两个插件都不删掉的情况下不让淬炼插件报错（好像不影响使用）
